title: Dazzling Double-Strand Mangalsutra with Diamond-Accented Pendants
materials: Crafted in high-quality rose gold plated alloy
adorned with faceted black onyx beads. Features sparkling cubic zirconia (CZ) diamonds for brilliant shimmer. Hypoallergenic and tarnish-resistant.
features: This modern mangalsutra presents a chic, double-layered design. The upper strand features a delicate star-shaped CZ-studded pendant, while the lower strand showcases a larger, floral-inspired CZ pendant. The precise placement of the black onyx beads adds a touch of traditional elegance to the contemporary design.
colors: Rose gold provides a warm and romantic hue
beautifully contrasting with the deep black onyx beads and the brilliant white sparkle of the cubic zirconia diamonds.
occasions: or as a thoughtful gift for anniversaries
or other special celebrations. Its contemporary design also makes it suitable for modern outfits and fusion ensembles.
description: This double-strand mangalsutra offers a fresh take on a traditional symbol of marriage. Its lightweight design ensures comfortable all-day wear, while the cubic zirconia diamonds provide a luxurious touch at an accessible price point. Its modern design allows it to be paired easily with both traditional and contemporary outfits, making it a versatile addition to any jewelry collection.
